title: Mrs R
description: Grieving for the untimely and tragic loss of her husband. That all changes when her twin daughters bring their best friend Luc home. He’s young, hot and sexy – Rachel’s new guilty pleasure who literally entices her back to the land of the living. But with her husband’s work commitments to be attended to and the intimidating new CEO Joe Mason to contend with – Rachel’s life twists and turns in ways she could never have imagined…..or fantasised….or begged for.
author: Jessie Courts
